jobsJson.text: Public Relations Manager for Financial Services
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Develop & implement of Corporate Communications OKR
● Respond to media questions and aggressively pitch stories to the media, develop media kits and organize media event
● Develop and implement 360 PR strategy and calendar for Financial Services new products 
● Manage PR calendar
● Work closely with product, branding and marketing team to develop product positioning and branding
● Develop briefing notes and talking points for appointed spokeperson
● Work with crisis team to counter negative publicity and handle crisis and emergency communications.
● Keep tight lid on confidential plans and development of the company

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Has a minimum bachelor degree in any major from reputable university  
  • Has an experience and very strong background in media relations
  • Has at least 8 years experience in communication; such as PR, communications, media, and corporate communications (experienced in working as communications consultant or in a News Media in Indonesia is a plus) 
  • Have a mission alignment, curiosity and passion for social impact Have an indepth knowledge of government policies and tech company landscape in Indonesia and Region. (Knowledge about fintech or financial services is a plus) 
  • Have a great skill of corporate communications, campaign creation, article pitching, media relations, event organization, writing skills in Indonesian and English, crisis communication handling, and media relations  (A data driven and experienced in research will be a plus)  
  • Able to travel and have a flexible working time   
  • Experience in tech companies or financial institutions/fintech is preferred
